content: Ufuk Celikcan | Dept. of Computer Engineering, Hacettepe University Ufuk Çelikcan Bio CV Teaching Contact Research & Projects Ufuk Çelikcan Visit our HUCGLab website for up-to-date research and projects information. Wanted! Looking for graduate/undergraduate students motivated for research. You may join the ongoing work on (a) 3D Vision and Perception (b) Reinforcement Learning (c) Virtual Reality Or, we can start something fresh in one of the research domains mentioned below. If you are interested, just send me an e-mail. Scholarships Available Scholarships for graduate and undergraduate students are available in research projects. Innovative students with 'can do' attitude to challenges are highly encouraged to apply. Research Interests Computer Graphics and Human Computer Interaction. 3D Vision and Stereoscopy Virtual Reality / Augmented Reality / Mixed Reality Computer Animation Human Motion Synthesis and Analysis Machine Learning in CG and HCI Artificial Intelligence in Video Games Serious Games and Simulations Computer Vision, Image Processing and Perception Visual Tracking, Visual Perception, Visual Saliency, Human Activity Recognition Need a Reference? I am glad to provide letters of recommendation for students with whom I have collaborated through research and/or projects, enabling me to speak with confidence about their abilities and potential. Yapacağınız proje araştırma ya da uygulama bazlı olabilir. Gerçekleştireceğiniz proje her iki dersi kapsayacak şekilde iki döneme yayılabilir veya tek ders kapsamında tek dönemde bitirilebilecek nitelikte olabilir. Dersi başka arkadaşlarınızla beraber alıp takım halinde veya tek başınıza alıp bireysel olarak çalışabilirsiniz. Düşünceniz somutlaşırsa programınıza eklemeden önce mutlaka görüşüp fikirleri ve beklentileri konuşalım.
